answer: Cosentyx's reported net sales for the full year 2024 were USD 9,244 million (+24%, +24% cc). On a reported basis, those results were +24% YoY from USD 7,294 million in 2023. On a constant currency basis, those results were +24% YoY from USD 6,580 million in 2023, based on a USD 9,244 million in reported sales in 2024. Immunology segment specifics are not available at this time due to forecasting and financial data aggregation standards.
